summary: Tested Document Generation batch feature. All 10 features tested successfully: Login flow, /generate-documents page with 3-step workflow, client list with search, client data loading, template checkboxes for multi-select, /documents page for template management, template upload form fields, GET /api/documents/templates, POST /api/documents/get-batch-variables, POST /api/documents/generate-batch. Backend API tests: 9/9 passed. Frontend UI tests: All critical flows working.
passed_tests: TEST 2: /generate-documents page loads with 3-step workflow (Select Client, Select Templates, Review & Fill) - PASS
TEST 3: Client list displays properly with search filtering - PASS (30 clients loaded, search works)
TEST 4: When client is selected, their data loads (green indicator shows 'Data loaded') - PASS
TEST 5: Template list shows checkboxes for multi-select - PASS (checkbox visible, '1 selected' badge shows)
TEST 6: /documents page loads for template management - PASS
TEST 7: Template upload form shows all fields: Name, Type, County, Case Type, Category, File - PASS (all 6 fields present)
TEST 8: API endpoint GET /api/documents/templates returns templates list - PASS (1 template: 'Appearance')
TEST 9: API endpoint POST /api/documents/get-batch-variables works for batch variable consolidation - PASS
TEST 10: API endpoint POST /api/documents/generate-batch works for batch generation - PASS (generated PDF successfully)
critical_code_review_comments: Batch generation endpoints (generate-batch, get-batch-variables) are properly implemented in /app/backend/routers/documents.py lines 1282-1500
Frontend GenerateDocumentsPage.js correctly implements 3-step workflow with multi-select checkboxes
Client list properly uses cached matters endpoint (/api/airtable/cached/matters) returning 'matters' array
Template filtering by case type works correctly (Probate template shows for Probate client)
DocumentsPage.js upload modal has all required fields with proper validation
seed_data_creation: Used existing template 'Appearance' (Probate, Cook, Form) and client 'Estate of King Hung Wong (Linda Wong)' for batch generation test
context_for_next_testing_agent: Document Generation batch feature fully tested. 1 template exists ('Appearance' - Probate/Cook/Form). Batch generation API successfully generates PDFs. UI shows 3-step workflow: Select Client → Select Templates (with checkboxes) → Review & Fill. Generated History tab shows previous generations. All APIs working: /api/documents/templates, /api/documents/get-batch-variables, /api/documents/generate-batch.
